== Compiling and executing queries ==

Running a XML query is fairly easy. 
{{{
InputStream input = ..  ; // a query as stream
[http://code.google.com/p/xbird/source/browse/trunk/xbird-open/main/src/java/xbird/xquery/XQueryProcessor.java XQueryProcessor] proc = new XQueryProcessor();
// #1 parse a query
[http://code.google.com/p/xbird/source/browse/trunk/xbird-open/main/src/java/xbird/xquery/XQueryModule.java XQueryModule] module = proc.parse(input);
// #2 execute the compiled expression using ``pull'' mode
[http://code.google.com/p/xbird/source/browse/trunk/xbird-open/main/src/java/xbird/xquery/dm/value/Sequence.java Sequence]<? extends Item> result = proc.execute(module);
for([http://code.google.com/p/xbird/source/browse/trunk/xbird-open/main/src/java/xbird/xquery/dm/value/Item.java Item] item : result) {// Note that every Sequence instances implement Iterable. 
    /* do something with item. */
    ..
}
}}}
